### Prerequisites

- Node.js 18.x+
- npm 9.x+
- Claude Code CLI
- Docker (optional, for monitoring stack)

### Installation

```bash
# Clone repository
git clone https://github.com/taiyousan15/taisun_agent.git
cd taisun_agent

# Install dependencies
npm install

# Setup environment
cp .env.example .env
# Edit .env with your API keys
```

### Verification

```bash
# Run tests (775 tests)
npm test

# Type check
npm run typecheck

# Lint
npm run lint

# Build
npm run build:all
```
